message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.CR, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper discusses value learning systems and their incentives to follow shutdown instructions, which are topics related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The scenarios presented in the paper involve supervised POMDPs, which are a type of machine learning model, indicating a connection to machine learning (cs.LG). The discussion of attempting to attain guarantees in a value learning framework involves optimization and control (cs.RO) and cybersecurity (cs.CR). Finally, the paper's focus on systems that follow shutdown commands under weaker assumptions suggests a connection to systems and control (cs.SY).
